steps.title: Find a great article
steps.subtitle: Step 1
steps.text: You found a great article on the web. Great! Save it into Pageturner, directly from your browser.

steps.title: Read it when you're ready
steps.subtitle: Step 2
steps.text: Pageturner offers you a clutter-free interface that makes reading a pleasure. You don't even need to be connected to the Internet!

steps.title: Even better, listen to it!
steps.subtitle: Step 3
steps.text: Because we live in the future, Pageturner employs Oscar-worthy robots to read articles aloud for you, so you can read even when you can't read!
